title: Comedian Eric Andre claims racial profiling and humiliation at Melbourne airport
content: American comedian Eric Andre reported being racially profiled and searched by sniffer dogs at Melbourne Airport. He shared his experience on Instagram and X, expressing concerns for other travellers of colour. Andre intends to consult a discrimination lawyer and has urged people of colour to be cautious when travelling through Melbourne Airport. The airport is investigating the claims.
summary: American comedian Eric Andre reported being racially profiled and searched by sniffer dogs at Melbourne Airport. He shared his experience on Instagram and X, expressing concerns for other travellers of colour. Andre intends to consult a discrimination lawyer and has urged people of colour to be cautious when travelling through Melbourne Airport. The airport is investigating the claims.

title: Taiwan conducts missile drills at sensitive test site
content: Taiwan conducted missile drills at the Jiupeng base, simulating the interception of enemy fighters and munitions, aiming to boost its 'combat effectiveness' against China. The exercises saw the firing of Sky Bow III and US-made Patriot II missiles, with all missiles hitting their targets successfully, marking a significant step in Taiwan's efforts to strengthen its defense capabilities.
summary: Taiwan conducted missile drills at the Jiupeng base, simulating the interception of enemy fighters and munitions, aiming to boost its 'combat effectiveness' against China. The exercises saw the firing of Sky Bow III and US-made Patriot II missiles, with all missiles hitting their targets successfully, marking a significant step in Taiwan's efforts to strengthen its defense capabilities.

title: Kevin O'Leary slams 'Kamalanomics' as ‘inflationary and unfeasible’
content: Kevin O'Leary criticised Kamala Harris's economic proposals on CNN, especially her plans to ban grocery price gouging and increase affordable housing. He compared these to failed socialist policies and labelled them impractical and inflationary. The Wall Street Journal echoed similar sentiments, likening Harris’s proposals to unsuccessful global price controls.
summary: Kevin O'Leary criticised Kamala Harris's economic proposals on CNN, especially her plans to ban grocery price gouging and increase affordable housing. He compared these to failed socialist policies and labelled them impractical and inflationary. The Wall Street Journal echoed similar sentiments, likening Harris’s proposals to unsuccessful global price controls.

title: What to watch as the Democratic National Convention enters its second day in Chicago
content: The Democratic National Convention continued with a focus on Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. Former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama supported Harris' nomination. Protests related to various social issues and the Israel-Hamas war occurred near the event. Former President Donald Trump held counter-events in battleground states.
summary: The Democratic National Convention continued with a focus on Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. Former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama supported Harris' nomination. Protests related to various social issues and the Israel-Hamas war occurred near the event. Former President Donald Trump held counter-events in battleground states.

title: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthens in Pacific, expected to stay offshore
content: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthened in the eastern Pacific Ocean, providing relief to coastal residents. By Monday night, no coastal warnings were issued. Positioned 720 miles southwest of Mexico's Baja California peninsula, Gilma showed potential to reach hurricane strength midweek, accompanied by sustained winds of 60 mph. Meanwhile, Hurricane Ernesto caused dangerous rip currents along the US East Coast.
summary: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthened in the eastern Pacific Ocean, providing relief to coastal residents. By Monday night, no coastal warnings were issued. Positioned 720 miles southwest of Mexico's Baja California peninsula, Gilma showed potential to reach hurricane strength midweek, accompanied by sustained winds of 60 mph. Meanwhile, Hurricane Ernesto caused dangerous rip currents along the US East Coast.

title: 'We're going nowhere': Thai opposition figure says court interventions must stop
content: Thailand's Pita Limjaroenrat, banned from politics for 10 years, called for judiciary reforms to end cycles of interventions affecting governance. Despite his popularity, the dissolution of his Move Forward Party and the dismissal of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin highlighted ongoing political instability in Thailand, dominated by the military and powerful institutions.
summary: Thailand's Pita Limjaroenrat, banned from politics for 10 years, called for judiciary reforms to end cycles of interventions affecting governance. Despite his popularity, the dissolution of his Move Forward Party and the dismissal of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin highlighted ongoing political instability in Thailand, dominated by the military and powerful institutions.

title: 'Bridging proposal': Blinken says Israel accepts Gaza plan, presses Hamas to agree
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's acceptance of a US "bridging proposal" to resolve disagreements for a Gaza ceasefire. Blinken urged Hamas to agree. The proposal aims to resume stalled ceasefire talks in Qatar. Despite optimism, significant challenges remain, with key issues unresolved over months of negotiation.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's acceptance of a US "bridging proposal" to resolve disagreements for a Gaza ceasefire. Blinken urged Hamas to agree. The proposal aims to resume stalled ceasefire talks in Qatar. Despite optimism, significant challenges remain, with key issues unresolved over months of negotiation.

title: Obama, Clinton and... Deja Foxx? Influencers pitch Kamala Harris at DNC
content: Kamala Harris, gaining traction in her presidential bid, turned to social media influencers for support at the Democratic National Convention. Over 200 influencers received special access to delegates and studio space, reflecting the campaign's focus on digital outreach. Key influencers will speak at the convention to boost Harris’s momentum as she navigates complex political issues and criticisms.
summary: Kamala Harris, gaining traction in her presidential bid, turned to social media influencers for support at the Democratic National Convention. Over 200 influencers received special access to delegates and studio space, reflecting the campaign's focus on digital outreach. Key influencers will speak at the convention to boost Harris’s momentum as she navigates complex political issues and criticisms.

title: Mohammed bin Salman forged king’s sign on Yemen war decree: Ex-official
'Minorities in Bangladesh being forced to resign, threatened to leave country'
British tech giant Mike Lynch among missing after yacht sinks off Sicily
Republicans launch Biden impeachment report - without proof
Blinken: Bibi has agreed to mediators’ truce proposal
Harris super PAC founder says public polls are too optimistic
content: Chauncey McLean, president of Future Forward, revealed that their internal polling for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign is less optimistic than public surveys. McLean highlighted close races in key states and emphasized the importance of winning Pennsylvania, North Carolina, or Georgia for Harris to secure the presidency. Public desires for detailed policy positions from Harris were also noted.
summary: Chauncey McLean, president of Future Forward, revealed that their internal polling for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign is less optimistic than public surveys. McLean highlighted close races in key states and emphasized the importance of winning Pennsylvania, North Carolina, or Georgia for Harris to secure the presidency. Public desires for detailed policy positions from Harris were also noted.

title: Hasina's minister arrested; 2 more murder cases against deposed PM
'If elected would offer Elon Musk Cabinet role or ... ': Trump
content: During a campaign stop, Donald Trump suggested Elon Musk for a key role in his potential future administration. He praised Musk's intelligence, describing him as a 'brilliant guy.' Earlier, the two discussed creating a government efficiency commission. However, Trump's plan to dismantle Biden's EV policies might pose challenges for Tesla, Musk's company.
summary: During a campaign stop, Donald Trump suggested Elon Musk for a key role in his potential future administration. He praised Musk's intelligence, describing him as a 'brilliant guy.' Earlier, the two discussed creating a government efficiency commission. However, Trump's plan to dismantle Biden's EV policies might pose challenges for Tesla, Musk's company.

title: All you need to know about DNC: Schedule, speakers and themes
content: The Democratic Party convention in Chicago saw Vice-President Kamala Harris accept the presidential nomination, following President Biden's decision not to seek reelection. Minnesota Governor Tim Walz was named as her running mate. Prominent speakers included Barack Obama and Bill Clinton. Key policy proposals focused on economic reforms, healthcare and reproductive rights, aiming to portray a progressive vision for the future.
summary: The Democratic Party convention in Chicago saw Vice-President Kamala Harris accept the presidential nomination, following President Biden's decision not to seek reelection. Minnesota Governor Tim Walz was named as her running mate. Prominent speakers included Barack Obama and Bill Clinton. Key policy proposals focused on economic reforms, healthcare and reproductive rights, aiming to portray a progressive vision for the future.

title: 'Genocide Joe' chants ring out as protesters breach DNC security
content: Protesters breached a police-secured fence near the Democratic National Convention site in Chicago, voicing opposition to the Gaza war. Although some disturbances occurred, the inner security perimeter remained intact. As President Biden toured the venue, activists demanded an end to US aid to Israel, echoing sentiments from the 1968 protests against the Vietnam War.
summary: Protesters breached a police-secured fence near the Democratic National Convention site in Chicago, voicing opposition to the Gaza war. Although some disturbances occurred, the inner security perimeter remained intact. As President Biden toured the venue, activists demanded an end to US aid to Israel, echoing sentiments from the 1968 protests against the Vietnam War.

title: Why Tim Walz got married on anniversary of Tiananmen Square, GOP senator asks
content: Tim Walz married Gwen on June 4, 1994 -- the fifth anniversary of the uprising in China's Tiananmen Square. Gwen at that time said Tim Walz wanted a date that he would always remember. Tim Walz spent a year in the Far East in 1989 when he taught English and American history and culture in Foshan, Guangdong province, as part of the WorldTeach program learning Mandarin. Tim also went to China for his honeymoon.
summary: Tim Walz married Gwen on June 4, 1994 -- the fifth anniversary of the uprising in China's Tiananmen Square. Gwen at that time said Tim Walz wanted a date that he would always remember. Tim Walz spent a year in the Far East in 1989 when he taught English and American history and culture in Foshan, Guangdong province, as part of the WorldTeach program learning Mandarin. Tim also went to China for his honeymoon.

title: Conservative former judger 'unhesitatingly' endorses Kamala Harris, calls Trump 'singularly unfit'
content: Conservative former judge J Michael Luttig Monday endorsed Kamala Harris and said former president Donald Trump is a threat to democracy. He said his political differences with Kamala Harris' party does not matter as far as this election is concerned because Donald Trump is "singularly unfit". In a statement, accessed by the CNN, Luttig, a veteran of two Republican administrations, wrote that there is only one candidate this election who can claim the mantle of defender and protector of America's democracy.
summary: Conservative former judge J Michael Luttig Monday endorsed Kamala Harris and said former president Donald Trump is a threat to democracy. He said his political differences with Kamala Harris' party does not matter as far as this election is concerned because Donald Trump is "singularly unfit". In a statement, accessed by the CNN, Luttig, a veteran of two Republican administrations, wrote that there is only one candidate this election who can claim the mantle of defender and protector of America's democracy.
